articles.title: Illinois man pleads guilty to hacking hundreds of Snapchat accounts to steal nude photos
articles.summary: Kyle Svara of Oswego, Illinois is facing decades in prison after pleading guilty to aggravated identity theft, wire fraud, computer fraud, conspiracy to commit computer fraud and false statements related to child pornography.
